DOC.brief_summary: A two armed randomized trial is evaluating the effect of the medical-student-delivered school-based intervention Education Against Tobacco on the smoking behavior of adolescents in 7-11th grade of secondary school. The primary endpoint is the change in smoking prevalence between the two groups.
DOC.brief_title: Education Against Tobacco Randomized Trial in Brazil
DOC.criteria: Visiting grades 711 of a regular public secondary school in Brazil. Not fulfilling inclusion criteria.
